#Text=Póvoa de Varzim
#Text=Póvoa de Varzim is a city in the Douro Litoral , Norte region of Portugal .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Póvoa de Varzim is one of the oldest fishing towns in Portugal , and a beach resort since the 19th century for beach healing purposes due to large quantities of iodine in the air and seawater .
#Text=The city has diverse districts , an old picturesque downtown , the old fishermen district , high rise beach districts and an emerging contemporary east district .
#Text=Póvoa is a nightlife hotspot in Portugal .
#Text=Get in
#Text=Póvoa de Varzim is located 15 km from Porto airport ( OPO ) and to reach the city , travelers can not only use buses , and taxis , but also Metro do Porto lightrail services ( line B ) .
#Text=By plane
#Text=Porto Airport is the closest airport and it is easy to reach Póvoa de Varzim by public transport .
#Text=You can take tram E from the Airport to tram stop Verdes and then change to tram B towards Póvoa de Varzim .
#Text=To take the tram you need to buy Andante ticket Z3 .
#Text=By train
#Text=Porto
#Text=By boat
#Text=Povoa Marina ( 41 °22′N 08 °46 W )
#Text=Get around
#Text=subway[metro]Porto-P . de Varzim
#Text=See
#Text=Around the waterfront
#Text=Beaches - several bay shaped sandy beaches
#Text=Passeio Alegre - Entertainment district , includes amongst bars , the historic beach library/bar ( Diana Bar )
#Text=Casino da Póvoa - in Passeio Alegre district .
#Text=Is a traditional and monumental European casino .
#Text=Avenida dos Banhos - Main beaches avenue , spotted with beach bars , very lively in the summer and sunny weekends .
#Text=Póvoa Fortress - built to protect the town from pirate attacks
#Text=The four remaining old Beach Villas of Avenida Mousinho de Albuquerque
#Text=The seaport and the fishermen quarter with the Lapa Lighthouse-Church
#Text=Around the city center
#Text=Praça do Almada - Central square , local traditional architecture , 16th century pillory , statue of Eça de Queirós
#Text=Póvoa de Varzim City Hall - in Praça do Almada , 18th century architecture that mixes Portuguese tiles , English style and French engineering .
#Text=Rua da Junqueira - 19th century shopping Street , traditional architecture and stores
#Text=Ethnography and History Museum
#Text=Largo das Dores Square and its churches
#Text=Igreja Matriz - Main church of the city in the old town center with Portuguese art
#Text=Around the countryside
#Text=Romanesque Church of Rates and Village of Rates - one of the best and oldest of Portugal 's Romanesque .
#Text=Cividade de Terroso in Cividade Hill- Celtic city ruins , houses , walls , streets .
#Text=The 3 thousand year old cradle of Povoa .
#Text=São Félix Hill - religious hill with panoramic views over the city and the countryside .
#Text=Mid-range
#Text=Grande Hotel da Póvoa , Passeio Alegre 20 , ☏ +351252290400 .
#Text=Axis Vermar Conference & Beach Hotel , ☏ +351252298900 , ✉ reservas@axisvermar.com .
#Text=Go next
#Text=Vial do Conde , Maia , Porto , Gaia , Espinho , Amarante , Guimaraes , Braga .
